Player History
Drafted in 1st round, 16th overall pick, by Detroit in 1988...
Injured on 6/17/1988 with a Strained Thigh Muscle, out for one week...
Injured on 5/16/1991 with a Pulled Calf Muscle, out for 2 weeks...
Had first career hit (double) on 4/2/1992, off Juan Berenguer (TEX)...
Hit first career homerun on 4/23/1992, off Steve Ontiveros (NYY)...
Won World Series with Detroit in 1992...
Drove in 6 runs against Boston on 8/24/1993...
Won Player of the Week award on 8/25/1993, hitting .565 with 3 HR, 9 RBI...
Injured on 7/29/1994 with a Concussion, out for 1-2 weeks...
Was selected to the 1995 Allstar game...
